episodes.synopsis: Anna discovers that "cows" emit a polluting gas. / There's a sandcastle contest on the beach. / The humans have deserted a red flag on the beach.
episodes.title: Operation Methane / Operation Sandstorm / Operation Red Flag

episodes.synopsis: Cmdr. Medusa wants global warming to go faster. / Offshore wind turbines have been erected near the trio's beach. / Anna discovers a "Canadian Well."
episodes.title: Operation One More Degree / Operation John Quixote / Operation Dig It

episodes.synopsis: Anna is trying to grow batteries. / The squad takes a nap on Barbecue Day. / Pulpo discovers that deforestation is a main cause of global warming.
episodes.title: Operation Battery Tree / Operation Revenge of the Barbecue / Operation Lumberjack

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes realize the sun causes global warming. / Anna discovers the Albedo Effect. / The hit squad finds a piece of polished glass on the beach.
episodes.title: Operation Yellow Ball That Heats / Operation Albedo / Operation Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: Our trio discovers a cell phone buried in the sand. / Mister Kyoto deploys an anti-solar shield. / The hit squad mistakes plastic bags for animals.
episodes.title: Operation Standby / Operation Sun of the Beach / Operation Plastic Mustangs

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes' new target is a supertanker. / Star's team mistakes a frisbee for a flying saucer. / The hit squad finds an icebox on the beach.
episodes.title: Operation Kraken / Operation Very Close Encounters / Operation Ice Age

episodes.synopsis: The plankton HQ is attacked by a robot. / Anna discovers an abandoned toy plane. / Anna takes litter samples to satisfy her scientific curiosity.
episodes.title: Operation Ko-Toy Robot / Operation Immediate Take-Off / Operation the Big Pinch

episodes.synopsis: The Supreme Commander needs to boost morale. / The trio takes on mussels. / An ecological exhibit takes place on the beach club reserved for children.
episodes.title: Operation Boost Troop Morale / Operation Stuffed Mussels / Operation Taking the Bickey Club

episodes.synopsis: Agents have blocked the evacuation of the hospital's wastewater. / Pulpo is transformed into a giant squid. / The stooges are thrown into a basket.
episodes.title: Operation Contaminated Water / Operation the Incredible Hulkalamarez / Operation the Great Escape

episodes.synopsis: Pulpo and Anna find an aerosol bomb under HQ. / Phytoplankton are moving toward the beach. / The trio observes the humans install a big black panel.
episodes.title: Operation Aerosol Bomb / Operation Phytoplankton / Operation Solar Hell

episodes.synopsis: Anna uses the hit squad to study the benefits of seaweed. / The hit squad sabotages a concert. / The squad learns jogging increases CO2 production.
episodes.title: Operation Biofuel and Body Care / Operation Voice of an Angel / Operation Fear Over Oostduinkerke

episodes.synopsis: The team discovers a prisoner fish. / The sun is getting itself nibbled by another huge, mysterious ball. / Pulpo has a passion for soda pop.
episodes.title: Operation Saving Private Fish / Operation Armaplankton / Operation Sparkling Squid

episodes.synopsis: The hit squad remembers the origin of its creation. / The squad looks for things on the beach made of paper. / Anna discovers the combustion engine.
episodes.title: Operation Planktop Gun / Operation Burn Paper Burn / Operation Vroom Vroom

video.title: Plankton Invasion
video.synopsis: Cmdr. Medusa puts plankton soldiers the Tentacle Trio in charge of Operation Global Warming, a plot to cover the Earth's surface with water.
